channel.title: Need Some Compiler Help!
channel.description:
Hey allz,
I am a nub at coding i know that, so dont flame me or wteva... i am creating my server and whenever i compile it, it always come up with 100 errors if i try to fix it, alter it, it doesn't change its still 100 errors and the old code is still there and yes i had saved the client.java, i'm not that stupid. So, some basic help i need to know, what a:
Expression is, i keep getting illegal start of an expression
a statement, keep getting "so and so" is not a statement, so need to know what i am doing wrong
(identifier) expected, i dunno what that is...
and all r in client.java so yea i dunno if its the compiler or what but any help would b highly appreciated thanks
skilld-

item.title: Need Some Compiler Help!
item.dc:creator: @skilld_ya skilld ya
item.description:
@skilld_ya wrote:

i have it says hang on lemme compile and i’ll take pic
it says: ( in one of the rows for example )

client.java:916: illegal start of expression
another
client.java:916: is not a statement

Lemme try post a pic 2 seconds…

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 02, 2008, 02:19:59 AM[/size][hr]Here’s a Pic: argh sorry my comp gone all wierd wont upload the pic, not like its big just the size of a compiler… well yea, its got 100 errors and its really beginning to bug me cause i can’t compile it into the game any1 that can help of that infomation would b great!

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some Compiler Help!
item.dc:creator: @Qotsa Qotsa
item.description:
@Qotsa wrote:

Hi, it would be more helpful to US for you to post a picture, or explain more accurately what the error is…
Also if you’re sure you have fixed it properly make sure it isn’t a different .jav file that has the error

Read full topic
